verses.verse: וַיְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi become כַאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> cha-'a-Sher it נִשְׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> nish-Ma' heard לְסַנְבַלַּ֣ט <S%H5571><s%> le-san-val-Lat Now it came to pass when Sanballat וְ֠טוֹבִיָּה <S%H2900><s%> Ve-toi-yah and Tobiah וּלְגֶ֨שֶׁם <S%H1654><s%> u-le-Ge-shem and Geshem הָֽעַרְבִ֜י <S%H6163><s%> ha-'ar-Vi the Arabian וּלְיֶ֣תֶר <S%H3499><s%> u-le-Ye-ter and the rest אֹֽיְבֵ֗ינוּ <S%H341><s%> 'o-ye-Vei-nu, of our enemies כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki for בָנִ֙יתִי֙ <S%H1129><s%> va-Ni-ti that I had builded אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַ֣חוֹמָ֔ה <S%H2346><s%> ha-cho-Mah, the wall וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- and no נ֥וֹתַר <S%H3498><s%> No-tar left בָּ֖הּ bah פָּ֑רֶץ <S%H6556><s%> Pa-retz; and [that] there was no breach גַּ֚ם <S%H1571><s%> gam although עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- that הָעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> ha-'Et at that time הַהִ֔יא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hi, he דְּלָת֖וֹת <S%H1817><s%> de-la-Tot the doors לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- and no הֶעֱמַ֥דְתִּי <S%H5975><s%> he-'e-Mad-ti I had not set up בַשְּׁעָרִֽים׃ <S%H8179><s%> vash-she-'a-Rim. the gates

וַיִּשְׁלַ֨ח <S%H7971><s%> vai-yish-Lach sent סַנְבַלַּ֤ט <S%H5571><s%> san-val-Lat That Sanballat וְגֶ֙שֶׁם֙ <S%H1654><s%> ve-Ge-shem and Geshem אֵלַ֣י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai to לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, unto me saying לְכָ֞ה <S%H1980><s%> le-Chah Come וְנִֽוָּעֲדָ֥ה <S%H3259><s%> ve-niv-va-'a-Dah let us meet יַחְדָּ֛ו <S%H3162><s%> yach-Dav together בַּכְּפִירִ֖ים <S%H3715><s%> bak-ke-fi-Rim in [some one of] the villages בְּבִקְעַ֣ת <S%H1237><s%> be-vik-'At in the plain אוֹנ֑וֹ <S%H207><s%> o-No; of Ono וְהֵ֙מָּה֙ <S%H1992><s%> ve-Hem-mah they חֹֽשְׁבִ֔ים <S%H2803><s%> cho-she-Vim, But they thought לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-Sot to do לִ֖י li רָעָֽה׃ <S%H7451><s%> ra-'Ah. me mischief

וָאֶשְׁלְחָ֨ה <S%H7971><s%> va-'esh-le-Chah And I sent עֲלֵיהֶ֤ם <S%H5921><s%> 'a-lei-Hem and מַלְאָכִים֙ <S%H4397><s%> mal-'a-Chim messengers לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, unto them saying מְלָאכָ֤ה <S%H4399><s%> me-la-Chah work גְדוֹלָה֙ <S%H1419><s%> ge-do-Lah a great אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I am עֹשֶׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> 'o-Seh, I [am] doing וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo not אוּכַ֖ל <S%H3201><s%> 'u-Chal so that I cannot לָרֶ֑דֶת <S%H3381><s%> la-Re-det; come down לָ֣מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Lam-mah Why תִשְׁבַּ֤ת <S%H7673><s%> tish-Bat cease הַמְּלָאכָה֙ <S%H4399><s%> ham-me-la-Chah why should the work כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher whilst אַרְפֶּ֔הָ <S%H7503><s%> 'ar-Pe-ha, I leave וְיָרַדְתִּ֖י <S%H3381><s%> ve-ya-rad-Ti it and come down אֲלֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Chem. about

וַיִּשְׁלְח֥וּ <S%H7971><s%> vai-yish-le-Chu Yet they sent אֵלַ֛י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai about כַּדָּבָ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> kad-da-Var after this sort הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh this אַרְבַּ֣ע <S%H702><s%> 'ar-Ba' unto me four פְּעָמִ֑ים <S%H6471><s%> pe-'a-Mim; times וָאָשִׁ֥יב <S%H7725><s%> va-'a-Shiv and I answered אוֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> o-Tam כַּדָּבָ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> kad-da-Var them after the same manner הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh. the same ס sa-Mek

וַיִּשְׁלַח֩ <S%H7971><s%> vai-yish-Lach Then sent אֵלַ֨י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai then סַנְבַלַּ֜ט <S%H5571><s%> san-val-Lat Sanballat כַּדָּבָ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> kad-da-Var unto me in like manner הַזֶּ֛ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh the same פַּ֥עַם <S%H6471><s%> Pa-'am time חֲמִישִׁ֖ית <S%H2549><s%> cha-mi-Shit the fifth אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- נַעֲר֑וֹ <S%H5288><s%> na-'a-Ro; his servant וְאִגֶּ֥רֶת <S%H107><s%> ve-'ig-Ge-ret letter פְּתוּחָ֖ה <S%H6605><s%> pe-tu-Chah with an open בְּיָדֽוֹ׃ <S%H3027><s%> be-ya-Do. in his hand

כָּת֣וּב <S%H3789><s%> ka-Tuv Wherein [was] written בָּ֗הּ Bah, בַּגּוֹיִ֤ם <S%H1471><s%> bag-go-Yim among the heathen נִשְׁמָע֙ <S%H8085><s%> nish-Ma' It is reported וְגַשְׁמ֣וּ <S%H1654><s%> ve-gash-Mu and Gashmu אֹמֵ֔ר <S%H559><s%> 'o-Mer, saith אַתָּ֤ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah you וְהַיְּהוּדִים֙ <S%H3064><s%> ve-hai-ye-hu-Dim [it that] thou and the Jews חֹשְׁבִ֣ים <S%H2803><s%> cho-she-Vim think לִמְר֔וֹד <S%H4775><s%> lim-Rod, to rebel עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- which כֵּ֛ן <S%H3651><s%> ken for which cause אַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah you בוֹנֶ֖ה <S%H1129><s%> vo-Neh thou buildest הַחוֹמָ֑ה <S%H2346><s%> ha-cho-Mah; the wall וְאַתָּ֗ה <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tah, you הֹוֶ֤ה <S%H1933><s%> ho-Veh that thou mayest be לָהֶם֙ la-Hem לְמֶ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> le-Me-lech, their king כַּדְּבָרִ֖ים <S%H1697><s%> kad-de-va-Rim according to these words הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <S%H428><s%> ha-'El-leh. to these

וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> ve-gam- have also נְבִיאִ֡ים <S%H5030><s%> ne-vi-'Im prophets הֶעֱמַ֣דְתָּ <S%H5975><s%> he-'e-Mad-ta And thou hast also appointed לִקְרֹא֩ <S%H7121><s%> lik-Ro to preach עָלֶ֨יךָ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-cha concerning בִֽירוּשָׁלִַ֜ם <S%H3389><s%> vi-ru-sha-Lim of thee at Jerusalem לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, saying מֶ֚לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech [There is] a king בִּֽיהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> bi-hu-Dah, in Judah וְעַתָּה֙ <S%H6258><s%> ve-'at-Tah now יִשָּׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> yish-sha-Ma' and now shall it be reported לַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> lam-Me-lech, to the king כַּדְּבָרִ֣ים <S%H1697><s%> kad-de-va-Rim according to these words הָאֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ha-'El-leh; to these וְעַתָּ֣ה <S%H6258><s%> ve-'at-Tah now לְכָ֔ה <S%H1980><s%> le-Chah, come וְנִֽוָּעֲצָ֖ה <S%H3289><s%> ve-niv-va-'a-Tzah now therefore and let us take counsel יַחְדָּֽו׃ <S%H3162><s%> yach-Dav. together ס sa-Mek

וָאֶשְׁלְחָ֤ה <S%H7971><s%> va-'esh-le-Chah Then I sent אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav to לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, unto him saying לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> lo have not נִֽהְיָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> nih-Yah done כַּדְּבָרִ֣ים <S%H1697><s%> kad-de-va-Rim no such things הָאֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ha-'El-leh, Such אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah you אוֹמֵ֑ר <S%H559><s%> o-Mer; as thou sayest כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for מִֽלִּבְּךָ֖ <S%H3820><s%> mil-lib-be-Cha them out of thine own heart אַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah you בוֹדָֽאם׃ <S%H908><s%> vo-Dam but thou feignest

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for כֻלָּ֗ם <S%H3605><s%> chul-Lam, for all מְיָֽרְאִ֤ים <S%H3372><s%> me-ya-re-'Im For they all made us afraid אוֹתָ֙נוּ֙ <S%H853><s%> o-Ta-nu לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, saying יִרְפּ֧וּ <S%H7503><s%> yir-Pu shall be weakened יְדֵיהֶ֛ם <S%H3027><s%> ye-dei-Hem Their hands מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- with הַמְּלָאכָ֖ה <S%H4399><s%> ham-me-la-Chah from the work וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo and it תֵעָשֶׂ֑ה <S%H6213><s%> te-'a-Seh; that it be not done וְעַתָּ֖ה <S%H6258><s%> ve-'at-Tah now חַזֵּ֥ק <S%H2388><s%> chaz-Zek Now therefore [O God] strengthen אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יָדָֽי׃ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Dai. my hands

וַאֲנִי־ <S%H589><s%> va-'a-ni- I בָ֗אתִי <S%H935><s%> Va-ti, Afterward I came בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> beit unto the house שְֽׁמַֽעְיָ֧ה <S%H8098><s%> she-ma'-Yah of Shemaiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son דְּלָיָ֛ה <S%H1806><s%> de-la-Yah of Delaiah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son מְהֵֽיטַבְאֵ֖ל <S%H4105><s%> me-hei-tav-'El of Mehetabeel וְה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> ve-Hu who עָצ֑וּר <S%H6113><s%> 'a-Tzur; who [was] shut up וַיֹּ֡אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and he said נִוָּעֵד֩ <S%H3259><s%> niv-va-'Ed Let us meet together אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- in בֵּ֨ית <S%H1004><s%> beit in the house הָאֱלֹהִ֜ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him of God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about תּ֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> Toch within הַֽהֵיכָ֗ל <S%H1964><s%> ha-hei-Chal, the temple וְנִסְגְּרָה֙ <S%H5462><s%> ve-nis-ge-Rah and let us shut דַּלְת֣וֹת <S%H1817><s%> dal-Tot the doors הַהֵיכָ֔ל <S%H1964><s%> ha-hei-Chal, of the temple כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> ki for בָּאִ֣ים <S%H935><s%> ba-'Im for they will come לְהָרְגֶ֔ךָ <S%H2026><s%> le-ha-re-Ge-cha, to slay וְלַ֖יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> ve-Lay-lah thee yea in the night בָּאִ֥ים <S%H935><s%> ba-'Im will they come לְהָרְגֶֽךָ׃ <S%H2026><s%> le-ha-re-Ge-cha. to slay

וָאֹמְרָ֗ה <S%H559><s%> va-'o-me-Rah, And I said הַאִ֤ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ha-'Ish a man כָּמ֙וֹנִי֙ <S%H3644><s%> ka-Mo-ni Should such יִבְרָ֔ח <S%H1272><s%> yiv-Rach, as I flee וּמִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> u-Mi any כָמ֛וֹנִי <S%H3644><s%> cha-Mo-ni like אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- I יָב֥וֹא <S%H935><s%> ya-Vo ;and who [is there] that [being] as I [am] would go אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- into הַהֵיכָ֖ל <S%H1964><s%> ha-hei-Chal into the temple וָחָ֑י <S%H2425><s%> va-Chai; to save his life לֹ֖א <S%H3808><s%> lo not אָבֽוֹא׃ <S%H935><s%> a-Vo. ;I will not go in

וָאַכִּ֕ירָה <S%H5234><s%> va-'ak-Ki-rah And lo I perceived וְהִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh surely לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- not אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him that God שְׁלָח֑וֹ <S%H7971><s%> she-la-Cho; had not sent כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki for הַנְּבוּאָה֙ <S%H5016><s%> han-ne-vu-'Ah this prophecy דִּבֶּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> dib-Ber him but that he pronounced עָלַ֔י <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lai, against וְטוֹבִיָּ֥ה <S%H2900><s%> ve-toi-Yah against me for Tobiah וְסַנְבַלַּ֖ט <S%H5571><s%> ve-san-val-Lat and Sanballat שְׂכָרֽוֹ׃ <S%H7936><s%> se-cha-Ro. had hired

לְמַ֤עַן <S%H4616><s%> le-Ma-'an this שָׂכוּר֙ <S%H7936><s%> sa-Chur Therefore [was] he hired ה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> Hu, he לְמַֽעַן־ <S%H4616><s%> le-ma-'an- reason אִירָ֥א <S%H3372><s%> 'i-Ra that I should be afraid וְאֶֽעֱשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> ve-'e-'e-seh- and do so כֵּ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> ken accordingly וְחָטָ֑אתִי <S%H2398><s%> ve-cha-Ta-ti; and sin וְהָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah have לָהֶם֙ <S%H1992><s%> la-Hem like לְשֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> le-Shem report רָ֔ע <S%H7451><s%> Ra', and [that] they might have [matter] for an evil לְמַ֖עַן <S%H4616><s%> le-Ma-'an order יְחָֽרְפֽוּנִי׃ <S%H2778><s%> ye-Cha-re-Fu-ni. that they might reproach פ Peh

זָכְרָ֧ה <S%H2142><s%> za-che-Rah think אֱלֹהַ֛י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hai My God לְטוֹבִיָּ֥ה <S%H2900><s%> le-toi-Yah thou upon Tobiah וּלְסַנְבַלַּ֖ט <S%H5571><s%> u-le-san-val-Lat and Sanballat כְּמַעֲשָׂ֣יו <S%H4639><s%> ke-ma-'a-Sav according to these their works אֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh; to these וְגַ֨ם <S%H1571><s%> ve-Gam and also לְנוֹעַדְיָ֤ה <S%H5129><s%> le-no-'ad-Yah Noadiah הַנְּבִיאָה֙ <S%H5031><s%> han-ne-vi-'Ah and on the prophetess וּלְיֶ֣תֶר <S%H3499><s%> u-le-Ye-ter and the rest הַנְּבִיאִ֔ים <S%H5030><s%> han-ne-vi-'Im, of the prophets אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who הָי֖וּ <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yu were to מְיָֽרְאִ֥ים <S%H3372><s%> me-ya-re-'Im that would have put me in fear אוֹתִֽי׃ <S%H853><s%> o-Ti.

וַתִּשְׁלַם֙ <S%H7999><s%> vat-tish-Lam was finished הַֽחוֹמָ֔ה <S%H2346><s%> ha-cho-Mah, So the wall בְּעֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> be-'es-Rim in the twenty וַחֲמִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H2568><s%> va-cha-mish-Shah and fifth לֶאֱל֑וּל <S%H435><s%> le-'e-Lul; [day] of [the month] Elul לַחֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <S%H2572><s%> la-cha-mish-Shim in fifty וּשְׁנַ֖יִם <S%H8147><s%> u-she-Na-yim and two יֽוֹם׃ <S%H3117><s%> Yom. days פ Peh

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi, become כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher after שָֽׁמְעוּ֙ <S%H8085><s%> sha-me-'U heard כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all א֣וֹיְבֵ֔ינוּ <S%H341><s%> 'oy-Vei-nu, And it came to pass that when all our enemies וַיִּֽרְא֗וּ <S%H7200><s%> vai-yir-'U, saw כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- and all הַגּוֹיִם֙ <S%H1471><s%> hag-go-Yim [thereof] and all the heathen אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after סְבִֽיבֹתֵ֔ינוּ <S%H5439><s%> se-vi-vo-Tei-nu, that [were] about us וַיִּפְּל֥וּ <S%H5307><s%> vai-yip-pe-Lu cast down מְאֹ֖ד <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od [these things] they were much בְּעֵינֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H5869><s%> be-'ei-nei-Hem; in their own eyes וַיֵּ֣דְע֔וּ <S%H3045><s%> vai-Ye-de-'U, for they perceived כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> ki for מֵאֵ֣ת <S%H854><s%> me-'Et for אֱלֹהֵ֔ינוּ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-nu, of our God נֶעֶשְׂתָ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> ne-'es-Tah was wrought הַמְּלָאכָ֥ה <S%H4399><s%> ham-me-la-Chah that this work הַזֹּֽאת׃ <S%H2063><s%> haz-Zot. likewise
